reuters.title: HOGAN SYSTEMS <HOGN> IN ACQUISITION
reuters.body: Hogan Systems Inc said it acquired <Systems 4 Inc> of Durango, Colo., for 1.7 mln dlrs. Hogan said Systems 4 provides integrated applications software and processing services to about 30 community banks. Systems 4 has revenues of 1.5 mln dlrs a year, Hogan said. Reuter 
